name: Slimeterpeace
description:
Slimeterpeace is game about slime in Jail. Try to escape!

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Left mouse button - Shoot
  • Right mouse button - Pick up / Drop item

(you will find it on -1 level, but... hmm)

Story

Slimes was in prison cell where user drag it thinking what slime is a simple desctop damo, but orange brother(this slime) try to escape.

3.1 - never ask

Cheat code

Cheats have only in one copy of this game for my best friend, but cake is true.
